attributes.action: Make it so all children no matter their age or race can have free education.
attributes.background: Too many children do not have an education and it is time to change that.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. Children in the UK already have access to free education between the ages of 4 and 18, regardless of race. If you are referring to the education of children globally, then the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the education systems of other countries.
